abstract: An identifier that represents the language of the text or lyrics spoken or sung in the audio.

# commonIdentifierLanguage

**Type Property**

An identifier that represents the language of the text or lyrics spoken or sung in the audio.

## Declaration

```swift
static let commonIdentifierLanguage: AVMetadataIdentifier
```

## Common metadata identifiers

- **commonIdentifierAccessibilityDescription**: An identifier that represents the accessibility description for the media.
- **commonIdentifierAlbumName**: An identifier that represents the name of the album.
- **commonIdentifierArtist**: An identifier that represents the name of the artist.
- **commonIdentifierArtwork**: An identifier that represents an image relating to the album.
- **commonIdentifierAssetIdentifier**: An identifier that represents the asset ID for the media.
- **commonIdentifierAuthor**: An identifier that represents the name of the author.
- **commonIdentifierContributor**: An identifier that represents the name of the contributor.
- **commonIdentifierCopyrights**: An identifier that represents the copyright statement.
- **commonIdentifierCreationDate**: An identifier that represents the date of the original recording.
- **commonIdentifierCreator**: An identifier that represents the name of the creator.
- **commonIdentifierDescription**: An identifier that represents the description of the media.
- **commonIdentifierFormat**: An identifier that represents the file format of the media content.
- **commonIdentifierLastModifiedDate**: An identifier that represents the last modification date of the media.
- **commonIdentifierLocation**: An identifier that represents the location information for the media.
- **commonIdentifierMake**: An identifier that represents the name of the camera maker.
